title: Episode 69 w/ Brand Nubian
itunes:title: Episode 69 w/ Brand Nubian
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up with Lord Jamar and Sadat X of the legendary Brand Nubian. They talk linking with Grand Puba and the early days of the group, some of the controversies they have been involved in and a lot more. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
